channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0925; 02:34PM; Hollywood Hills West; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tswn2f; Hollywood Hills; LAFD Air Ops located the injured hiker mid-slope on the hillside and lowered a rescuer for assessment. The adult, female patient suffered a ground level fall and sustained a possible ankle fracture. LAFD Air Ops will conduct a hoist operation followed by hospital transport. No further details.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT 12/25/2023 INC#0078

item.description: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT; INC#0078; 12:55AM; 5021 S San Pedro St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RWj0AQ; South Park; Firefighters extinguished fire in a detached bungalow in 14 minutes. Sadly two family pets were located inside, deceased. Five occupants are displaced and being assisted with immediate needs. No further details. ; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT 12/25/2023 INC#0023

item.description: Structure Fire - FIRE NOW OUT; INC#0023; 12:20AM; 17841 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tohSMW; Northridge; 30 firefighters extinguished fire in one unit on the 2nd floor of a 3 story (two residential over parking) garden style apartment building in 15 minutes. There are no injuries reported. No further details; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1209; 05:44PM; 2712 S Halldale Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vbpK4X; Adams-Normandie; KNOCKDOWN: 44 firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes. The fire extended from the 1st to the 2nd floor with no other structures damaged. One 44 y/o male patient transported in serious condition with smoke inhalation and traumatic leg injury. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1209; 05:21PM; 1770 W 27th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vdtMcT; Adams-Normandie; Two story, single family dwelling with heavy fire showing from the 1st floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 8; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0373; 07:33AM; 7237 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vjPE6j; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes with no injuries reported. Incident Commander requested LAFD Arson to respond for the investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; E289 E89 T89 RA889 RA89 E77 E260 E60 T60 BC14 BC10 AR1 ; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0373; 07:11AM; 7237 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vjPE6j; Sun Valley; Two story, garden style apartment building with fire showing from one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire 12/23/2023 INC#0148

item.description: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0148; 03:34AM; 2800 N Division St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RUD6ez; #CypressPark; 157 LAFD Firefighters took just 84 minutes in largely defensive operations to access, confine and largely extinguish heavy fire in an 11,120 square foot one-story industrial building housing a media production and event space know as L..A. River Studios. The site had just concluded a public (wedding?) event when the fire erupted. All attendees and staff safely evacuated the facility. Firefighters will remain at scene into the morning to extinguish hotspots. No injuries have been reported. The fire cause is under active investigation. LAFD Public Information Officer Captain Cody Weireter is on scene to assist the media. ; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; T50 E250 RA850 E44 E55 RA55 E201 E1 T1 BC2 BC1 E56 E42 E4 E220 T20 E235 T35 E212 T12 CM22 SQ21 EM11 BC11 T3 E203 E3 UR3 HR3 RA3 RA803 UR88 BC5 E20 RA1 E35 E12 E211 T11 E202 T2 AR1 EM14 BC14 PI3 SO1 E29 E33 T27 E227 T29 E229 E61 T21 E221 HE1 EA1; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0148; 02:10AM; 2800 N Division St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RUD6ez; #CypressPark; PRELIM: Defensive operations on a 200' x 200' one-story movie studio well involved, with fire through the roof.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; T50 E250 RA850 E44 E55 RA55 E201 E1 T1 BC2 BC1 E56 E42 E4 E220 T20 E235 T35 E212 T12 CM22 SQ21 EM11 BC11 T3 E203 E3 UR3 HR3 RA3 RA803 UR88 BC5 E20 RA1 E35 E12 E211 T11 E202 T2 AR1 EM14 BC14 PI3 ; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update - #RoyalOakFire - Major Emergency Structure Fire 12/22/2023 INC#1162

item.description: Update - #RoyalOakFire - Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#1162; 06:15PM; 15837 W Royal Oak Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NDPsFm; #Encino; LAFD operations will continue into the night, to cool hotspots and complete the fire cause investigation within the now heavily damaged and physically unstable structure. The homeowner has confirmed the three story residence - undergoing a major renovation, has 28,000 square-feet of floorspace. The (unspecified number or craft) workers who were on site when the fire started, escaped unharmed, and no firefighters have been injured.; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E288 E88 T88 E83 E109 RA99 E278 T78 RA78 BC10 BC14 T39 E239 CM42 CM40 UR88 HA6 H6 E90 E93 E293 T93 E87 SQ87 EM14 BC12 T89 E289 E89 UR89 HR3 BC5 SO1 HA7 H7 HA3 H3 HA5 H5 EA1 AR1 HE1 EX2 T27 E227 T61 E261 E11 E205 T75 E275 PI3; CH8; 17 18; Brian Humphrey
